snippet: The Turkish authorities have seized control of the Cihan news agency, expanding the crackdown against supporters of the Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen.
lead_paragraph: The Turkish authorities have seized control of the Cihan news agency, expanding the crackdown against supporters of the Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen.

headline.main: Turkey: Authorities Take Over Another Opposition News Source
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Authorities Take Over Another Opposition News Source
